articles.author: Jesse Whittock
articles.title: Stage Invader Who Grabbed Ariana Grande On ‘Wicked: For Good’ Red Carpet Jailed In Singapore - Deadline
articles.description: The man who grabbed Ariana Grande on the red carpet for Wicked: For Good's Asia-Pacific premiere has been sentenced to nine days in jail.
articles.content:
The man who grabbed Ariana Grande on the red carpet for Wicked: For Good‘s Asia premiere has been sentenced to nine days in jail.
Multiple reports say Australian citizen Johnson Wen was found guilty… [+1827 chars]
